title: CowboyStudio Quick Neck Shoulder Camera Sling Belt Strap for Canon Nikon Sony Cameras
description: This CowboyStudio Camera Strap constructed of ballistic nylon for extreme durability, design for outdoor photo shooting job, it can protect your camera Lens when you are traveling and when you go for your shot outdoor. It fits most of the SLR camera on the market. There is a tripod quick-release plate with 1/4" thread for connecting the camera to any device with 1/4" screw. Comfortable to use. The strap adopts ergonomic design, and the weight is distributed evenly by way of the shoulder pad. Quick shooting Strap fits comfortably across your shoulder and torso, positioning your camera on your side. The Strap takes away the pain off your neck and returns the pleasure of shooting. You do not need hang your heavy DSRL on your neck. In one swift motion, you can more faster use your camera into shooting position.
